title: Type checking error in hyper-rustls with rustc 1.14 beta

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
[Crater report](https://gist.github.com/anonymous/ff0de62a57f73a2cb1054e69569c00e4).

This doesn't happen on 1.13.

```
   Compiling hyper-rustls v0.2.0 (file:///home/crate)

error[E0308]: mismatched types

   --> src/lib.rs:179:45

    |

179 |     tls_config.root_store.add_trust_anchors(&webpki_roots::ROOTS);

    |                                             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected slice, found array of 142 elements

    |

    = note: expected type `&[webpki::TrustAnchor<'_>]`

    = note:    found type `&[webpki::TrustAnchor<'static>; 142]`


error[E0308]: mismatched types

   --> src/lib.rs:214:32

    |

214 |     tls_config.set_single_cert(certs, key);

    |                                ^^^^^ expected struct `rustls::Certificate`, found struct `std::vec::Vec`

    |

    = note: expected type `std::vec::Vec<rustls::Certificate>`

    = note:    found type `std::vec::Vec<std::vec::Vec<u8>>`


error[E0308]: mismatched types

   --> src/lib.rs:214:39

    |

214 |     tls_config.set_single_cert(certs, key);

    |                                       ^^^ expected struct `rustls::PrivateKey`, found struct `std::vec::Vec`

    |

    = note: expected type `rustls::PrivateKey`

    = note:    found type `std::vec::Vec<u8>`


error[E0308]: mismatched types

   --> src/lib.rs:247:5

    |

247 |     rustls::internal::pemfile::certs(&mut reader)

    |     ^ expected struct `std::vec::Vec`, found struct `rustls::Certificate`

    |

    = note: expected type `std::vec::Vec<std::vec::Vec<u8>>`

    = note:    found type `std::vec::Vec<rustls::Certificate>`


error[E0308]: mismatched types

   --> src/lib.rs:258:5

    |

258 |     keys.remove(0)

    |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected struct `std::vec::Vec`, found struct `rustls::PrivateKey`

    |

    = note: expected type `std::vec::Vec<u8>`

    = note:    found type `rustls::PrivateKey`


error: aborting due to 5 previous errors


error: Could not compile `hyper-rustls`.
```
cc @ctz
